text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/biologicallyderived-productcodes defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
e0398 RED BLOOD CELLS|CPD>AS5/450mL/refg|Irr|ResLeu RED BLOOD CELLS|CPD>AS5/450mL/refg|Irr|ResLeu
s1128 HPC, APHERESIS/Citrate/XX/refg/Mobilized HPC, APHERESIS/Citrate/XX/refg/Mobilized
s1194 HPC, APHERESIS|NS/XX/<=-120C|10% DMSO|Cryopreserved|Mobilized HPC, Apheresis product, 10% DMSO, mobilized, cryopreserved at <=-120C
s1195 HPC, APHERESIS|NS/XX/<=-120C|5% DMSO|Cryopreserved|Mobilized HPC, Apheresis product, 5% DMSO, mobilized, cryopreserved at <=-120C
s1310 HPC, APHERESIS|None/XX/refg|3rd Party Comp:Yes|Other Additives:Yes|Mobilized|CD34 enriched HPC, Apheresis product, third party components added, other additives added, mobilized, CD34 enriched, stored at refrigeration temperatures
s1398 HPC, MARROW|NS/XX/rt|Plasma reduced HPC, Marrow, plasma reduced, stored at room temperature
s2598 HPC, MARROW|NS/XX/<=-150C|10% DMSO|3rd Party Comp:Yes|Cryopreserved|RBC reduced HPC, MARROW|NS/XX/<=-150C|10% DMSO|3rd Party Comp:Yes|Cryopreserved|RBC reduced
e4377 Apheresis RED BLOOD CELLS|ACD-A/XX/refg|Irradiated|1st container RED BLOOD CELLS Apheresis product, ACD-A, Irradiated,1st container, stored at refrigeration temperatures
t1396 BONE, FEMUR|Frozen|Right|Radiation sterilization BONE, FEMUR, Right, sterilized by radiation, stored at frozen temperatures

name: BiologicallyDerivedProductCodes
title: Biologically Derived Product Codes
description: This code system is a subset of ISBT 128 Product Description CodesÂ© published by ICCBBA as a part of the ISBT 128 standard. These codes support characterization and classification of medical products of human origin inclusive of processing conditions such as additives, volumes and handling conditions.

concept.definition: HPC, Apheresis product, 10% DMSO, mobilized, cryopreserved at <=-120C
HPC, Apheresis product, 5% DMSO, mobilized, cryopreserved at <=-120C

HPC, Marrow, plasma reduced, stored at room temperature
